conclusion: Trace the path of the liquid from each opening (A, B, and C) through the baffles to the containers at the bottom.
Liquid starts at opening A and flows downward.
Liquid from opening A first encounters the red baffle, which directs the liquid to the right.
Liquid from opening A hits the green baffle, which directs it further to the right.
Liquid from opening A encounters the purple baffle, which directs it to the left.
Liquid from opening A reaches the bottom and flows into container E.
Liquid starts at opening B and flows downward.
Liquid from opening B first encounters the green baffle, which directs the liquid to the right.
Liquid from opening B hits the purple baffle, which directs it further to the right.
Liquid from opening B encounters the orange baffle, which directs it to the left.
Liquid from opening B reaches the bottom and flows into container D.
Liquid starts at opening C and flows downward.
Liquid from opening C first encounters the green baffle, which directs the liquid to the left.
Liquid from opening C hits the purple baffle, which directs it further to the left.
Liquid from opening C encounters the orange baffle, which directs it to the right.
Liquid from opening C reaches the bottom and flows into container E.
Liquid from opening A flows into container E.
Liquid from opening B flows into container D.
Liquid from opening C flows into container E.
